data.title: Effective Communication
data.text: Ability to work in a team and collaborate with designers, backend developers, and the client.

data.title: Problem Solving
data.text: I'm a problem solver who finds creative, practical, and effective solutions to challenges.

data.title: Creativity and Design
data.text: I consider myself a developer with an aesthetic eye, without neglecting the good practices of web design.

data.title: Adaptability
data.text: I am always willing to learn new technologies and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in Front end development. I am also able to adapt to changes in project requirements and work environment.

data.title: Time Management and Organization
data.text: Ability to set priorities and meet deadlines. Experience with tools like Trello, Monday, or Slack.

data.title: Attention to Detail
data.text: I focus on creating high-quality, error-free websites. You can mention your focus on data validation, testing, and quality assurance.

data.title: Empathy and Active Listening
data.text: I strive to understand the needs and expectations of end-users and how this influences Front end development. I enjoy supporting my teammates, being available for questions or concerns.
